thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Chelsea - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: In town traveller.
thread.title_full: In town traveller. - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 669enar
title: In town traveller.
text: Attended a Three-day Conference just outside of Manhattan. Needed a location in close proximity. Staying at the Hilton made the travel to and from the event very easy. It was also a plus to find restaurant, and many shopping opportunities in close proximity to the hotel. There also an abundant of transportation choices.
